alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 11:11AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Dale, Henry and northern Houston Counties in southeastern Alabama, northwestern Miller, Clay, Randolph, northwestern Lee, Calhoun, Early, Quitman and Terrell Counties in southwestern Georgia through 115 PM EDT/1215 PM CDT/... At 1210 PM EDT/1110 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Lakepoint Resort State Park to near Pinckard. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Fort Gaines, Morgan, Georgetown, Blakely, Dawson, Cuthbert, Headland, Dothan, Midland City, Kinsey, Cowarts, Edison, Arlington, Webb, Shellman, Columbia, Pinckard, Smithville and Douglasville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
